attributes.action: Suspend ALL overseas aid until all UK problems a thing of the past
attributes.additional_details:
This countries problems are far from being resolved and it is unacceptable to send hard earned tax payers monies out to other countries whilst we have so many environmental, moral, economic, immigration problems and issues. Lets sort out our own country first and get it back to being in excellent condition before thinking about sending OUR money to other countries who usually mis spend it or ends up in corrupt officials pockets

SUSPEND ALL OVERSEAS AID NOW
